Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
game.inventory.Inventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Saveable
public class Inventory extends Object implements Saveable
The Inventory class manages all items owned by the player. It supports item usage, storage, display, sorting, searching, and saving inventory data to a file. This class demonstrates sorting, searching, interfaces, and object-oriented design.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Inventory()
    Constructs a new Inventory object with default items and predefined item display order.

      public int sequentialSearch(String target)

      Returns:
